community.name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Tipping Stars Community
community.description: Welcome to the Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Tipping Stars Community. Asking for, offering and exchanging download codes is prohibited in this community and any parts of Miiverse. Players from around the world, regardless of language or region, can come together

community.name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Tipping Stars - Nintendo Levels
community.description: Your official source for the latest Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Tipping Stars news and information. Check out the latest official levels from Nintendo in this community! Posting is restricted to Nintendo representatives, but feel free to add your own comments.

community.name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Tipping Stars - User Levels
community.description: In this community, you can check out levels created by players of Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Tipping Stars!
